Industry.label: Industry
Industry.value: Trusts, Except Educational, Religious, and Charitable

CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: The Fund seeks current income as a primary objective and capital appreciation as a secondary objective The Fund seeks to achieve its investment objectives by utilizing a dynamic asset allocation strategy among multiple fixed income sectors in the global credit markets, including corporate debt, mortgage-related and other asset-backed instruments, government and sovereign debt, taxable municipal bonds, and other fixed-, variable- and floating-rate income-producing securities of U.S. and foreign issuers, including emerging market issuers. The Fund may invest without limitation in investment grade debt securities and below investment grade debt securities (commonly referred to as high yield securities or junk bonds), including securities of stressed, distressed or defaulted issuers.
